owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of token to withdraw
params.tokenToWithdraw: The address of the token to withdraw
The address of the token to withdraw

DepositCollateralSingle(address,uint256).notice: This function is used to deposit Collateral of a single asset in the Lending Pool

borrow(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: This function is used to borrow Tokens from the Lending Pool by giving Collateral

depositLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: This function is used to deposit liquidity in the Lending Pool

flashLoan(address,uint256).notice: This function is used to flash loan tokens from the Lending Pool

getCollateralValueInUSD(address,address).notice: This function is used to get the total collateral value in USD

getDepositsInUSD(address).notice: This function is used to get the total deposit value in USD

getFactory().notice: This function is used to get the Factory contract address

getFlashLoanFee().notice: This function is used to get the flash loan fee

getLendTokens().notice: This function is used to get the Lend Tokens contract address

getPoolAddress(address).notice: This function is used to get the price feed address

withdrawDepositedFunds(address,uint256,u.notice: This function is used to withdraw deposited funds from the Lending Pool and earn any accured interest rate on the deposited amount

withdrawMultipleDepositsSameAsset(addres.notice: This function is used to withdraw the total amount deposited by the user in the Lending Pool of a single asset and earn any accured interest rate on the deposited amount

withdrawTotalUserDeposit(address).notice: This function is used to withdraw multiple individual deposits of the same asset from the Lending Pool
